## retry() function

Executes the `task` and retry if failed. If `task` fails the given number of `times`<!-- -->, the promise is rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function retry<T>(times: number, task: AsyncTask<T>): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  times | number | The number of times the <code>task</code> should be retried |
|  task | [AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The task to retry if it fails |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;
